description:
Laura`s father loses his glasses at the bus stop and the Ham-Hams must find the glasses before Monday, or Laura`s father cannot go to his job and Hamtaro won`t be able to leave the house. The Ham-Hams find a pair of glasses and attempt to bring them to Laura`s father, but after the glasses are destroyed beyond repair, they turn out to be the wrong pair. Dexter takes the destroyed glasses and makes hamster-sized glasses for the Ham-Hams. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Tottoko Oou no Da! Papa no Megane
À la recherche des lunettes de papa !
とっとこ追うのだ! パパのメガネ
